import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { LoginContext } from '../LoginContext' import { useContext } from 'react' // import UserHeader from './UserHeader' function Header() { const { userLoginName, setUserLoginName, userLoginStatus, setuserLoginStatus } = useContext(LoginContext) function handleLogout() { const navigate = useNavigate() setuserLoginStatus(localStorage.removeItem('userLoginStatus')) setUserLoginName(localStorage.removeItem('userLoginName')) navigate('/reg') } return (
React
    {userLoginStatus ? <>
  • Welcome {userLoginName}
  • Login
    • :
  • Register
    • }
); } export default Header;
